data.text: Nying maber oloyo bedo gi mwandu mathoth;
Onge pogruok e kind jamoko kod jachan:
Ngʼat mariek neno masira kabiro kendo opondo,
Bolruok kod luoro Jehova Nyasaye
Yore joma timo richo opongʼ gi kudho kod obadho;
Puonj nyathi e yo monego odhiye,
Jochan gin wasumb jo-mwandu,
Ngʼatno mochwowo timbe richo kayo thagruok,
Ngʼat mangʼwon noyud gweth,
Riemb ngʼat ma jaro ji, to lweny bende aa,
Ngʼat ma chunye ler kendo ma wuoyo gi ngʼwono
Wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye rito ngʼeyo;
Jasamuoyo wacho niya, “Sibuor ni oko!”
Dho dhako ma jachode en bur matut;
Fuwo otwere e chuny nyathi,
Ngʼat mathiro jochan mondo mwandune omedre
Chik iti kendo iwinj weche mag jomariek;
nimar en mor ka ikanogi ei chunyi
Mondo omi ibed gi geno kuom Jehova Nyasaye;
Donge asendikoni weche mowachi piero adek,
mapuonjou adiera gi weche migeno,
Kik ima jachan nikech gin jochan
nimar Jehova Nyasaye biro chwako buchgi,
Kik imak osiep gi ngʼat ma iye wangʼ piyo;
dipo nono ka ipuonjori yorene,
Kik ibed ngʼatno matimo singruok
ka ionge gi yo kaka dichul,
Kik igol kidi mar kiewo machon
Bende ineno ngʼat molony e tije?
